cause.description:
Any donations (money, food, gas, objects of significant value, etc.) will be accepted. To put it simply. I need money. I can't do all of the things that I want to and I'm pissed because of it. I want a bigger apartment, some new clothes, a high paying job and car that runs on starlight. Please, lets nip poverty in the bud and stop my downward slide into homelessness before it even begins.
1. Let me live my dream of never having to work again
cause.mission: provide Paul with enough money so that he can live comfortably
cause.name: Paul Needs Money
